cause.description:
The Shan Dai are a people living primarily in the river valleys of some parts of Burma and China. A bible translation project is underway, but needs your prayer, and possibly, your involvement. To be involved or merely begin advocating for this cause, please visit:
http://www.shandai.com
At the site you can also receive your own prayer journal, a work entitled "His First Bible", a collection of prayers and photographs that illustrate the need for the gospel among the Shan...
1. All Shan Dai need the gospel of Jesus Christ.
2. The Shan Dai need to share the gospel in their own language.
cause.mission: provide a relevant translation of the Bible for the Shan Dai believing community.
cause.name: Shan Dai Bible Translation
